item.title: Modern Data Structures and Algorithms in Rust
item.description: ðŸ“˜ Welcome to “Modern Data Structures and Algorithms in Rust” link ðŸ“˜ About this Book link ðŸ“˜ "Modern Data Structures and Algorithms in Rust" (DSAR) is a groundbreaking text that merges the time-honored concepts of data structures and algorithms with the modern, powerful features of the Rust programming language. Designed for both students and professionals, this book provides a deep dive into the fundamental (F), conceptual (C), and practical (P) implementation of algorithms, all while leveraging Rustâ€™s unique capabilities for memory safety, concurrency, and performance.
